abstract: Guidelines issued by Centers for Disease Control and Prevention for Zika testing give priority to pregnant women with possible exposure to Zika and people with Zika-like symptoms, making it difficult for many others to get tested; guidelines ignore men and women who would like to have children but fear they may have been exposed to virus.

headline.print_headline: A Zika Test? It’s Not Easy
headline.main: Want a Zika Test? It’s Not Easy

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Men and women who want to be sure they are Zika free before trying to conceive are being told they aren’t eligible for Zika testing....
lead_paragraph: Men and women who want to be sure they are Zika free before trying to conceive are being told they aren’t eligible for Zika testing.
